page.title: 01WESTHOUGHTON SCHOOLS
page.content: In Westhoughton there is a great {variety}of schools.There are 10 Primary schools and 1 Comprehensive Secondary school.Of the primary schools{6 are Church of England,3 are {County Primary,and 1 is Roman {Catholic. } The age and style of building also varies from a very old {traditional} design (1851)to a modern{open-plan} design (1979). The schools range in size from very small(45 pupils)to a comparitively large one(390 pupils).The secondary school houses about 1100. At present one county pimary (Fourgates)is threatened with{closure} in July 1986 but a strong campaign against closure has begun.
